attributes.action: Change the name of "child pornography" to "child sexual abuse images or video"
attributes.additional_details:
I want the name changed. Pornography is consensual act between two grown up persons who are getting paid. 
We need to call it for what it is which is sexual child abuse videos or images. I think the word pornography give people the wrong idea Into thinking the children are a consenting party
attributes.background:
I want the name changed. Pornography is consensual act between two grown up persons who are getting paid. 
We need to call it for what it is which is sexual child abuse videos or images.

rejection.details: We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The relevant laws and criminal charges usually refer to indecent images or child sexual abuse. The Government is not responsible for the use of language in wider society.
